summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the functionality of the LayoutXLM tokenizer, covering token addition, special token handling, encoding/decoding, padding, truncation, batch processing, offset mapping, alignment with layout boxes, integration with model inputs, saving/loading mechanisms, and tokenizer training scenarios.
business_intent: Guarantee accurate and robust tokenization for layout-aware language models used in document understanding applications, ensuring correct handling of visual layout information, special tokens, and compatibility with downstream model pipelines.
